title: The Amara Kundan Choker: A Statement of Regal Elegance
features: This stunning choker showcases the timeless beauty of Kundan artistry. Each Kundan stone is meticulously set in a floral design, framed by a rich blue enamel. The intricate craftsmanship evokes the grandeur of Hyderabadi Nizami jewelry. Dangling freshwater pearls add a touch of delicate femininity. The 'gundu mala' design with cascading pearl droplets enhances its regal charm.
colors: Predominantly Gold with rich Blue Enamel accents
occasions: and grand receptions. A statement piece to elevate any ensemble
adding a touch of South Indian elegance to modern attire.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans, this choker is a testament to superior craftsmanship and timeless design. The use of high-quality Kundan stones ensures lasting brilliance. The traditional Telugu design makes it a culturally significant piece, perfect for passing down as an heirloom. Its bold design guarantees you will make a grand entrance and command attention.
